alert.note: Alert for Bastrop; Blanco; Caldwell; Comal; Gillespie; Hays; Travis (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 2:44AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Caldwell, Hays, Travis, Blanco, southeastern Gillespie, west central Bastrop and northeastern Comal Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 243 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near West Lake Hills to Dripping Springs to near Flugrath. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Austin, San Marcos, Kyle, Buda, Dripping Springs, Wimberley, Blanco, Tanglewood Forest, Austin Bergstrom Int Airport, Canyon Lake, Lakeway, Lago Vista, Bee Cave, West Lake Hills, Hudson Bend, The Hills, Johnson City, Woodcreek, Rollingwood and Uhland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bastrop; Blanco; Caldwell; Comal; Gillespie; Hays; Travis
